variable.name: DRAWDAYS
variable.comment: Number of days from randomization/enrollment to date of specimen draw.

variable.name: DRAWVY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this specimen was collected.

variable.name: DRAWTIME
variable.comment: Time specimen was drawn in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Descriptive statistics (min, max, mean, sd) are presented as 'seconds past midnight'.

variable.name: CFUGTIME
variable.comment: Time that centrifuging of specimen began in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Descriptive statistics (min, max, mean, sd) are presented as 'seconds past midnight'.

variable.name: VIALTIME
variable.comment: Time specimen placed into cryovials in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Descriptive statistics (min, max, mean, sd) are presented as 'seconds past midnight'.

variable.name: FREZTIME
variable.comment: Time cryovials placed in freezer in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Descriptive statistics (min, max, mean, sd) are presented as 'seconds past midnight'.

variable.name: FASTHRS
variable.comment: Number of hours since had anything to eat or drink besides water before specimen draw.

variable.name: VIGACT
variable.comment: Engaged in vigorous physical activity in last eight hours before specimen draw.

variable.name: ANTIINFL
variable.comment: Took aspirin or anti-inflammatory agents in last 48 hours before specimen draw.

variable.name: LIPEMIC
variable.comment: For HT and HT + DM screening visit and annual visits. Serum is lipemic.
